name: diorama
description: This was a project made for our class of interactive media. The final idea was to create a cubicle room that would consist out of 3D items made in blender, visualised in the web using Three.js.

name: artifact
description: This mobile application is a instagram-like social media with the ability to make posts that are bound to geolocations.

name: campus-buurt
description: This project was created as a collaboration project for Arteveldehogeschool. It enables collaboration between campusses and organisations to connect in order to organise events.
